button.name: get_nominatim_openstreetmap_coordinates
button.string: Get my gps coordinates from openstreetmap

group.p: You have not fetched your coordinates from openstreetmaps, please do it by pressing the button above. If no result is returned, please remember that the coordinates are fetched by using your company address, so please check if there are mistakes there. Do not use the search gps function too frequently, the openstreetmap service has a maximum numbers of searches allowed per day. If your address is not found anyway, you can insert you GPS coordinates manually and they will be diplayed on the map correctly.
